title: Modify private variable in Pair class - write code

content.question: Which of the following methods can be added to the Pair class to allow other classes to modify the value of y?

choices.label: private int setY(int num) { return num; }
public int setY(int num) { return num; }
private void setY(int num) { y = num; }
public void setY(int num) { y = num; }

content.answer: public void setY(int num) { y = num; }

skill.text: 2.C: Write program code involving procedural abstractions.
